products.name: Fresh Apples
products.description: Crisp and juicy, fresh apples are a great source of fiber and vitamin C. They promote heart health and help reduce the risk of chronic diseases. Perfect for snacking or adding to salads.

products.name: Fresh Banana
products.description: Rich in potassium, fresh bananas are perfect for a quick snack. They provide energy and are great for muscle recovery post-exercise. Enjoy them on their own or in smoothies.

products.name: Fresh Bitter Gourd
products.description: Known for its bitter taste, bitter gourd is rich in vitamins and minerals. It's beneficial for blood sugar control and may help lower cholesterol levels. Commonly used in stir-fries and juices.

products.name: Fresh Capsicum
products.description: Sweet and crunchy, fresh capsicum adds color and flavor to your dishes. They are high in antioxidants and vitamins A and C. Ideal for salads, stir-fries, and grilling.

products.name: Fresh Cucumber
products.description: Refreshing and hydrating, fresh cucumbers are low in calories and high in water. They are perfect for salads and as snacks. Cucumbers also contain antioxidants that promote healthy skin.

products.name: Fresh Okra
products.description: Rich in fiber and nutrients, fresh okra is a versatile vegetable. It aids digestion and is known for its anti-inflammatory properties. Commonly used in gumbo and stir-fried dishes.

products.name: Fresh Oranges
products.description: Citrusy and sweet, fresh oranges are an excellent source of vitamin C. They boost the immune system and promote skin health. Great for eating fresh or juicing.

products.name: Fresh Potato
products.description: A staple in many diets, fresh potatoes are versatile and filling. They provide energy through carbohydrates and are rich in potassium. Ideal for baking, boiling, or frying.

products.name: Fresh Tomato
products.description: Juicy and flavorful, fresh tomatoes are a great addition to salads and sauces. They are rich in lycopene, which may reduce the risk of certain cancers. Perfect for salads, sauces, or sandwiches.

products.name: Rotten Apples
products.description: Rotten apples are not safe to eat and should be discarded. Consuming spoiled fruits can lead to foodborne illnesses.

products.name: Rotten Banana
products.description: Rotten bananas are not edible and should be discarded. They can attract pests and should not be consumed.

products.name: Rotten Bitter Gourd
products.description: Rotten bitter gourd is unsafe for consumption and should be thrown away. Spoiled vegetables may cause digestive issues.

products.name: Rotten Capsicum
products.description: Rotten capsicum is not suitable for eating and should be disposed of. Spoiled vegetables can harbor harmful bacteria.

products.name: Rotten Cucumber
products.description: Rotten cucumbers are inedible and should be discarded. Eating spoiled cucumbers can lead to discomfort.

products.name: Rotten Okra
products.description: Rotten okra is not safe to eat and must be thrown away. Discard spoiled produce to avoid health risks.

products.name: Rotten Oranges
products.description: Rotten oranges are not safe for consumption and should be discarded. They can cause gastrointestinal problems.

products.name: Rotten Potato
products.description: Rotten potatoes are inedible and should be disposed of. Spoiled potatoes may contain toxins.

products.name: Rotten Tomato
products.description: Rotten tomatoes are not safe to eat and should be thrown away. Spoiled tomatoes can be harmful if ingested.
